title: 3 Cryptos That Could 5x in 2026 If Trump Delivers on Pro-Crypto Promises: XRP, BTC, and One Surprise
description: The Trump administration spent 2025 building crypto infrastructure. Now comes the payoff. After a year of policy groundwork—from signing the GENIUS Act in July to appointing new SEC and CFTC leadership—the stage is set for 2026 to deliver the institutional wave that could drive Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC), Solana (CRYPTO: SOL), and XRP (CRYPTO: XRP) to ... 3 Cryptos That Could 5x in 2026 If Trump Delivers on Pro-Crypto Promises: XRP, BTC, and One SurpriseThe post 3 Cryptos That Could 5x in 2026 If Trump Delivers on Pro-Crypto Promises: XRP, BTC, and One Surprise appeared first on 24/7 Wall St..
